txt.en: A drake slew the Orc that slew the dog that stole Sperling's sword
The Orc which took Sperling's sword from the dog appears to also have been slain... by a drake.
The Orc which took Sperling's sword from the dog appears to also have been slain... by a drake.\n\nYou should try and find the drake.
Drakes can be found hunting the aurochs-herds in the southern part of the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should hunt for the drake that swallowed Sperling's sword.
Drakes can be found hunting the aurochs-herds in the southern part of the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should hunt for the drake that swallowed Sperling's sword.
You should search the drake's corpse for Sperling's sword.
